EmailTemplate.subject: Discover Mango & Bamboo, our new essentials colors
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr/Mrs {!Contact.LastName},
I am excited to introduce you to the Essential Collection’s newest pastel colours: Bamboo & Mango.
Inspired by the tropical products of Thailand’s famed floating markets, the collection features a soft, refined green and a vibrant shade of orange.
**These seasonal hues are available in three suitcase sizes, as well as in our beloved Personal Cross-body Clutch bag.** Knowing your taste, I thought that the **MANGO/BAMBOO PRODUCT ** might be the perfect summer piece to add to your collection.
Should you need more details on the products or help making a product reservation, don't hesitate to let me know.
Kind regards,
{!User.Name} RIMOWA {!User.Base_Store_Code__c} Tel:{!User.Mobile} RIMOWA.com
